quest_desc.qdesc: 1. 아르젠타와 대화 2. 주교와 대화 3. 클림드와 대화 4. 귀족들과 돌아가며 대화

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Argenta$
Take care, weakling.
(You must report to Bishop Ignacio.)

$Elite Soldier$
I heard that although it was a fierce battle, you saved the Prophet.
That is a relief.

$Geraint$
As long as I am here, no one can touch her, the descendant of the ancient

$Lady Kayleen${action:Talk}
I heard the girl, Prophet is still asleep, am I right? She is asleep like a lazy girl. I knew this would happen! Everyone was waiting for her because she is the Prophet but I knew she was a useless girl!

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
I heard the girl, Prophet is still asleep, am I right? Expect this to happen and she is such a useless girl and everyone still waiting for her because she is the prophet

$Duke Stuart$
From the troops report, I saw the Gold Dragon was the one who brought the Prophet into our Royal Castle's underground.
...This is something that we should consider about.

$General Douglas$
Mmm... I heard the Prophet is still asleep. How could she do that? We did our best to save her but she not doing any thing now. Why not let hand her over to the king and let him take care of her

$Bishop Ignacio$
hmm...It aint looking good. The Prophet... mumble...hmmm...And Geraint..mumble... Hmm.. How should we do this... Hmmm..
(Bishop Ignacio seems like he is lost in thought.)

$Argenta$
See ya later fool.

$Notice$
※ You have completed [Chapter 4. Royal Castle Saint Haven].
※ [Chapter 5. Geraint the Guardian] will be revealed during the next update.

Chapter 4. Saint Haven Royal Castle【完】

- The above sentence is the information that will be included in the journal when level 32 restriction is occurred. -

$Geraint$
As long as I am here, no one can touch her, the descendant of the ancient

$King Cassius$
I highly value your contributions for saving the Prophet. But I was both surprise and disappointed by her being a country girl and directly went to sleep without greeting me. *Sob*.

$Duke Stuart$
From the troops report, I saw the Gold Dragon was the one who brought the Prophet into our Royal Castle's underground.
...This is something that we should consider about.

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
I heard the girl, Prophet is still asleep, am I right? Expect this to happen and she is such a useless girl and everyone still waiting for her because she is the prophet

$General Douglas$
Mmm... I heard the Prophet is still asleep. How could she do that? We did our best to save her but she not doing any thing now. Why not let hand her over to the king and let him take care of her

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Bishop welcome you with a overwhelming smile.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio${action:talk}
Oh... Oh, Saint Haven's true companion!
Welcome!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes. I don't even know how that happened...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
You did a great job in defending Saint Haven like a true warrior.
But... I I never thought about Velskud would ever use the power of Black Dragon because he used to serve the Royal Castle as a knight.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(The Bishop is expressing a rueful look on his face.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
He fought against the Black Dragon. But it is strange and sad to know that he would use the power, such a pity

$Bishop Ignacio$
Moreover, Gold Dragon is the one who brought the Prophet to here.
We are unable to come to a conclusion even after having a discussion with all nobler

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Before any thing, I would wish to inform the people in my town that the Prophet is safe and sound.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
As I heard, you can only enter the place where the Prophet and the Gold Dragon stay.
It seems like Noblers have something to say to you. Would you mine listening to their complaints?

$Bishop Ignacio$
*giggle* Sorry, I forgotten than you are not from this town, but end up here while looking for the Prophet
If you are looking to send a letter to there, talk to Elite Soldier. He will help you.

$Bishop Ignacio$
I will see you again.
Although the Black Dragon is now disappeared, The daily buisness of the humans has just begun

$Bishop Ignacio${action:Talk}
You are a true warrior who has protected Saint Haven. You have accomplished a great thing.
※ You have completed [Chapter 4. Royal Castle Saint Haven].
※ [Chapter 5. Geraint the Guardian] will be revealed during the next update.

$Elite Soldier$
I heard that although it was a fierce battle, you saved the Prophet.
That is a relief and a good job indeed.

$Bishop Ignacio$
If you are looking to send a letter to there, talk to Elite Soldier. He will assist you.

$Elite Soldier${action:Talk}
Hey hey~ You looking to send a letter? You can pass it to me.
I will make a request to Royal Castle's Ambassadors.

$Elite Soldier$
Um... Am I just giving this to Mayor Harold at Prairie Town? If I am correct, then please write your name here.
(You have finished filling out the form.)

$Elite Soldier$
Um... Am I just giving this to Master Sorceress Cynthia at Mana Ridge? If I am correct, then please write your name here.
(You have finished filling out the form.)

$Elite Soldier$
Um... Am I just giving this to Cleric Thomas at Mana Ridge? If I am correct, then please write your name here.
(You have finished filling out the form.)

$Elite Soldier$
I will ensure the letter is being delivered
They must be very happy when receiving this good news.

$Elite Soldier$
You are busy am I right?
You must be very busy since you gained Bishop Ignacio's confidence.

$Elite Soldier${action:Talk}
Entrust me with this letter, I will ensured that it is delivered.
Are you going back to see Bishop Ignacio again?

$Bishop Ignacio$
Oh, you are back.
Those people who worried about the Prophet will get less worried since you let them know.

$Bishop Ignacio${action:Talk}
Noblers are discussing the pros and cons of the Prophet's treatment problem and injured troops.
Would you mind listening to their complaints since you are the only one that can enter the place where the Prophet sleep

$Bishop Ignacio$
Listen to their complaints one by one.
But I would prefer you to greet our young King Cassius.

$Bishop Ignacio$
People are talking about the Prophet who has not wake up. The Gold Dragon that brought her here. They are all confused in accepting these kind of happening
(You must talk to King Cassius.)

$King Cassius$
Troops are gossiping that the Blond Swordsman is the Gold Dragon...
How come he is not here to greet me?
He is so discourteous....

$King Cassius$
Geraint? His name sounds like the one of heroes who fought the Black Dragon in the past. Well... Geraint is a common name anyway...
He is so rude to lock Palace door without permission

$King Cassius$
Well I am suspose to pull him out and show him King's dignity. But being the kind me, I would forgive him base on the fact that he made a significant contribution to this Palace
Just make sure to keep the Prophet safe for me.

$King Cassius$
About the war clean-up, I will leave it to Duke and General Douglas. It... seem alright?
(Thek king is looking at Duke Stuart.)

$Bishop Ignacio$
People are talking about the Prophet who has not wake up. The Gold Dragon that brought her here. They are all confused in accepting these kind of happening
(You must talk to King Cassius.)

$King Cassius$
I agree to Duke suggestion that the Golden Dragon could stay in the underground of Royal Castle.
(You have to talk to Duke Stuart.)

$Duke Stuart${action:Stand2}
I am surprised because I thought dragons are all evil creatures.
Moreover, the Gold Dragon showed here with the Prophet in human form. Isn't this happening truly amazing you?
Thus, I thought like this.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Duke is impressed by the story he make himself.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
The Evil Dragon came here to Saint Haven itself to become a guardian because the Evil Dragon was swayed by our young King's moral.
Oooh... What a beautiful story is this?

$Duke Stuart$
If I send this news to the people in Saint Haven, they will be very happy about the news and praise our young king.
We must take credit of our great victory against the powerful Black Knight to the king. Because certainly it is all from our king's work. That's right!

$Duke Stuart$
Our king did more than what Elite Solidiers is doing, all they do is recalling more soldiers that all.
Hmm hmm... But I am not mocking at General Douglas's loyalty... Hm.

$Duke Stuart$
Okie, you can leave now, I need to prepare King's accomplishment. I believed you are happy with this action as you are the one who fought the Black Knight under our King's loyalty
(General Douglas is listening to Duke's speech with a stiff expression on his face.)

$Duke Stuart${action:Stand2}
What did elite soldier do except asking for more soldiers and requesting more armaments? Hm...
(You must talk to General Douglas.)

$King Cassius$
I totally agree on the understatement by Duke, but... I still feel General Douglas make a big contribution too
(You must talk to General Douglas.)

$Bishop Ignacio$
People are talking about the Prophet who does not wake up. The Gold Dragon that brought her here.
(You must talk to King Cassius.)

$General Douglas${action:Talk}
I heard the Prophet is not awake yet. Moreover, the Gold Dragon is the one who helped us to defeat enemies...
This is so hard to believe.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(General Douglas is having a dissatisfied expression on his face.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$General Douglas$
I am worried about people in Saint Haven since many things have happened at once. Duke and Bishop are trying to write up a story to satisfy the people and receive no complain when we told them about it, but they actually fOgret about the hard work of our troops instead.

$General Douglas$
Our Troops contribute massively and received damage too since we faced the war directly against monster. But all Duke ever thinks about is the Gold Dragon...
it is really sad to see that they are not appreciating our effort toward the war

$General Douglas$
We should focus on healing the wounded soldiers and defeating the rest of the monster
I don't know what Court Sorceress Kayleen would think about this.

$General Douglas$
I am unsure what the other nobles would think but we should focus on healing the wounded soldiers and defeating the rest of the monster
(You must talk to Court Sorceress Kayleen.)

$Bishop Ignacio$
People are talking about the Prophet who has not wake up. The Gold Dragon that brought her here. They are all confused in accepting these kind of happening
(You must talk to Court Sorceress Kayleen.)

$King Cassius$
When is the Prophet going to wake up? I looking forward to see her coming to greet me
(you must talk to Court Sorceress Kayleen.)

$Duke Stuart$
Hmm... The Gold Dragon had decided to become Guardian of Saint Haven due to its admiration of our King.! ...What do you think? Isn't this perfectly plausible?
(You must talk to Lady Kaylen.)

$Court Sorceress Kayleen${action:Talk}
I saw Bishop, who looks like a raccoon, his face turned blue as soon as he heard about the Gold Dragon appearance. You should have seen his face too.
He looked so cute!!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm actually worried about her as she is still not yet awake.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
I don't care whether the Gold Dragon stays in the underground or not.
But I am a bit worried about the Prophet because she is still asleep
if she is the Prophet, then isn't she supposed to give us some kind of prophecy? Don't you think?

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
I knew it! We had the same thoughts. Hahaha
But don't worry. I can wake up the Prophet with this strength of vision magic that handed down from Sorceresses. Look forward to this happening.

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Well, I... I can't do it right now. Have you not hear anything about preparation?!(Kayleen is hastily looking at a big book.)
I remember i saw it around here.. Maybe this is not the book
(Rummaging) Wha... What are you looking at?

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Why don't you go talk to the Bishop who looks like a raccoon? During the period, the preparation should be done.

$General Douglas$
We should focus on healing the wounded soldiers and defeating the rest of the monster
(You must talk to Bishop Ignacio.)

$King Cassius$
When is the Prophet going to wake up? I looking forward to see her coming to greet me
(you must talk to Bishop Ignacio.)

$Duke Stuart$
HThe Gold Dragon had decided to become Guardian of Saint Haven due to its admiration of our King.
...What do you think? Isn't this perfectly plausible?
(You must talk to Lady Kayleen.)

$Lady Kayleen${action:Talk}
Go play with Boship who looks like a raccoon while I am preparing the information. Hahaha.
(You must talk to Bishop Ignacio.)

$Bishop Ignacio${action:Talk}
I would assume you had heard the story. The whole town is very busy right now because of all this urgent issue.
But, out of all, I am worried about the Prophet.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Is there any way to wake her up?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
Ever since we saved the Prophet, she had been asleep since then. We do not know what kind of power she has nor what message is the Goddess trying to tell us
Moreover, Geraint cannot go anywhere because he is protecting the Prophet.

$Bishop Ignacio$
I heard Court Sorceress Kayleen is looking at vision of Dark Tower Magic Institute. So I am looking at the variety of information sources from the Order of the Goddess.

$Bishop Ignacio$
So far, we found one treatment that could possibly work.
Could please inform Geraint that I would like to go there and try to awake the Prophet?
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

journal.trigger_string: 후반부 업데이트 때 수정해야 할 것. 1. 목표 알리미 모드 custom 으로 수정해야 됨 2. 퀘스트 아이콘 NPC 39로 세팅
journal.title: Farewell
journal.contents:
Argenta said that she is going to go to Lotus Marsh. Since everything has been ended, go to Saint Haven Royal Castle and report to Bishop Ignacio.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Bishop Ignacio

journal.title: Good News
journal.contents:
News of Rose being rescued need to be delivered. Go talk to Elite Soldiers.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Elite Soldier
journal.destination: Deliver the news to Elite Soldier.
journal.todo_msg: Please deliver the news that Rose has been rescued to Elite Soldier.

journal.title: Business of the Humans I
journal.contents:
You have sent the letter. Go return to Bishop Ignacio.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Bishop Ignacio
journal.todo_msg: You have been sent the letter. Please talk to Bishop Ignacio once again.

journal.title: Business of the Humans II
journal.contents:
People have a lot of things to say about the war clean-up. Firstly, Talk to King Cassius first.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → King Cassius
journal.todo_msg: Please pay Attention to the story of King Cassius

journal.title: Business of the Humans III
journal.contents:
Well, apparently King Cassius has forgiven Geraint for staying at the Royal Castle underground. Talk to Duke Stuart.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Duke Stuart

journal.title: Business of the Humans IV
journal.contents:
It seems like Duke Stuart is planning to make up a story to give full achievement from this war to the King by taking advantage of Geraint. Talk to General Douglas.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Duke Stuart

journal.title: Business of the Humans V
journal.contents:
General Douglas is upset with the talk of the town that are only concentrating on the Gold Dragon and the Prophet instead of the troops who made the major contribution to the war. Lastly, talk to Court Sorceress Kayleen.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Court Sorceress Kayleen
journal.destination: Talk to Court Court Sorceress Kayleen
journal.todo_msg: Please talk to Court Sorceress Kayleen

journal.title: The Prophet's Sleep
journal.contents:
You had listen to all stories from the noblers. Talk to Bishop Ignacio again.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Bishop Ignacio
journal.todo_msg: Please talk to Bishop Ignacio again.
